briefdescription.para: Strips a type's pointer, reference, array extent and cv-qualification.

detaileddescription.para: Provides a member "type" that is T with all pointers, references, array extents and cv-qualification removed.
If T is a pointer to function or a pointer to member function type, the result is the function type. If T is a pointer to member object type, the result is the type of the object.
Adding custom template specialisations to this template results in undefined behaviour.
